lead_paragraph: When Michael Gazzarato took a job that required him to sign hundreds of affidavits in a single day, he had one demand for his employer: a much better pen, David Segal reports in The New York Times.
snippet: Lawyers who defend consumers in debt-collection cases say debt buyers used questionable tactics well before the recent foreclosure mess.
abstract: Lawyers who defend consumers in debt-collection cases say debt buyers used questionable tactics well before the recent foreclosure mess.
